scripts.build:preview: npm install && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.build:preview:sentry: npm install && npm run build && npm run preview:sentry
scripts.link:dev:
npm run madek-api-nuxt-layer:link && echo '
‚úÖ  Main application successfully linked to development layer!
üìã  Make sure the layer development server is running in parallel (run "npm run link:dev" in your madek-api-nuxt-layer repository folder).
‚ö†Ô∏è  Both development servers need to run for live updates.
' && npm run dev
scripts.link:dev:api-mock:
npm run madek-api-nuxt-layer:link && echo '
‚úÖ  Main application successfully linked to development layer!
‚úÖ  Make sure the layer development server is running in parallel (run "npm run link:dev" in your madek-api-nuxt-layer repository folder).
‚ö†Ô∏è  Both development servers need to run for live updates.
' && npm run dev:api-mock
scripts.test:e2e:
echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Using API mock (see playwright.config.ts for details).

' && playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:logging:
echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Using API mock (see playwright.config.ts for details).

' && ENABLE_PLAYWRIGHT_LOGGING=true playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:changed:
echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Using API mock (see playwright.config.ts for details).

' && playwright test --only-changed=main
scripts.test:e2e:failed:
echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Using API mock (see playwright.config.ts for details).

' && playwright test --last-failed
scripts.test:e2e:debug:
echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Using API mock (see playwright.config.ts for details).

' && playwright test --debug
scripts.test:e2e:ui:
echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Using API mock (see playwright.config.ts for details).

' && playwright test --ui --headed --workers=1
scripts.test:e2e:headed:
echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Using API mock (see playwright.config.ts for details).

' && playwright test --headed --workers=1
scripts.test:e2e:headed:slowmo:
echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Using API mock (see playwright.config.ts for details).

' && SLOWMO=2000 playwright test --headed --workers=1
scripts.test:e2e:codegen:
echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Make sure that the app is running on http://localhost:3000.

' && playwright codegen localhost:3000
scripts.test:e2e:preview:
echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Using API mock in preview mode. Note: Run "npm run build" first if layer changes were made.

' && ENABLE_PLAYWRIGHT_PREVIEW_SERVER=true ENABLE_PLAYWRIGHT_LOGGING=true playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:preview:debug:
echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Using API mock in preview mode. Note: Run "npm run build" first if layer changes were made.

' && npm run test:e2e:preview -- --debug
scripts.check:issues: npm run lint && npm run check:types && npm run check:unused && npm run test && npm run test:e2e
